spell_tooltip.description: Vengeful Retreat provides immunity to loss of control effects, and reduces damage taken by 35% until you land.
Imprison's PvP duration is increased by 1 sec, and targets become immune to damage and healing while imprisoned.
The radius of Darkness is increased by 4 yds, and its duration by 2 sec.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 15,698 Physical damage.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for 15 sec.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
You heal for 3% of all Fire damage you deal.

Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 55,413 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.

Each enemy stunned by Chaos Nova has a 30% chance to generate a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Consume 1 beneficial Magic effect removing it from the target.
Each enemy stunned by Chaos Nova has a 30% chance to generate a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and snares all enemies hit by 50% for 6 sec.

Charge to your target and deal 124,431 Fire damage.

Demon Blades has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.

Generates 40 Fury.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Spectral Sight has 5 sec reduced cooldown and no longer reduces movement speed.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Eye Beam causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
Increases your mastery by 4.5%.

Summons darkness around you in an 8 yd radius, granting friendly targets a 15% chance to avoid all damage from an attack. Lasts 8 sec.

Chance to avoid damage increased by 100% when not in a raid.
Afflicting an enemy with a Sigil generates 1 Lesser Soul Fragment.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Darkness by 120 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by 60 sec.
Sigil of Flame deals 70% increased damage and generates 2 additional Fury per target hit.

Charge to your target, striking them for 1.2 million Chaos damage, rooting them in place for 1.5 sec and inflicting 823,336 Chaos damage over 6 sec to up to 5 enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for 10% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for 20 sec.

Place a demonic sigil at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Detonates to deal 942,193 Chaos damage and shatter up to 3 Lesser Soul Fragments from enemies affected by the sigil. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Blasts all enemies in front of you, dealing guaranteed critical strikes for up to 2.6 million Chaos damage over 2.3 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 18,640 Shadow damage and generate 7-12 Fury.
Immolation Aura generates an additional 40 Fury over 10 sec.
Blade Dance deals 466,736 Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Throw Glaive deals 60% increased damage, reduced by 30% for each previous enemy hit.
Magical damage increased by 3%, and Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Slip into the nether, increasing movement speed by 100% and becoming immune to damage, but unable to attack. Lasts 6 sec.
You deflect incoming attacks while Blade Dancing, absorbing damage up to 15% of your maximum health.

Damaging an enemy before they damage you increases your critical strike chance by 10% for 5 sec.

Vengeful Retreat refreshes your potential to trigger this effect on any enemies you are in combat with.
Increases Versatility by 4% and reduces threat generated by 8%.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of Blade Dance and Eye Beam are immediately reset.
Throw Glaive now costs 25 Fury and throws a second glaive at the target.
The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional 144,704 Chaos damage over 4 sec.
Eye Beam generates 40 Fury every second, and its damage and duration are increased by 20%.
Eye Beam deals guaranteed critical strikes.
Immolation Aura's damage increases by 10% each time it deals damage.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
Enemies hit by Chaos Strike or Throw Glaive take 15% increased damage from Chaos Strike and Throw Glaive for 15 sec.

Demon Blades and Throw Glaive leave open wounds on your enemies, dealing 147,618 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 40%.

May be applied to up to 3 targets.

Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal 428,084 Chaos damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Throw Glaive causes targets to take an additional 80% of damage dealt as Chaos over 6 sec.

Each time Immolation Aura deals damage, 30% of the damage dealt by up to 3 critical strikes is gathered as Ragefire.

When Immolation Aura expires you explode, dealing all stored Ragefire damage to nearby enemies.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 80% of your critical strike chance.
Activating Eye Beam reduces the cooldown of your next Eye Beam by 5.0 sec, stacking up to 20 sec.
Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 7 total times.

Immolation Aura has 1 additional charge, 30% chance to refund a charge when used, and deals Chaos damage instead of Fire.

You can have multiple Immolation Auras active at a time.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.

Consuming 6 Soul Fragments or casting The Hunt converts your next Throw Glaive into Reaver's Glaive.

 Reaver's Glaive: 
Throw a glaive enhanced with the essence of consumed souls at your target, dealing 544,489 Physical damage and ricocheting to 3 additional enemies.
 
Begins a well-practiced pattern of glaivework, enhancing your next Chaos Strike and Blade Dance.

The enhanced ability you cast first deals 10% increased damage, and the second deals 20% increased damage.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Blade Dance casts 3 additional glaive slashes to nearby targets. 

If cast after Chaos Strike, cast 6 slashes instead.
Vengeful Retreat resets the cooldown of Felblade.

When enhanced by Reaver's Glaive, Chaos Strike applies Reaver's Mark, which causes the target to take 6% increased damage for 20 sec. 

If cast after Blade Dance, Reaver's Mark is increased to 12%.
The second enhanced ability in a pattern shatters an additional Soul Fragment.
Each Soul Fragment you consume shields you for an additional 15% of the amount healed.

Expose weaknesses in the target of your Reaver's Mark, causing your Physical damage to any enemy to also deal 20% of the damage dealt to your marked target as Chaos, and sometimes shatter a Lesser Soul Fragment.
Chaos Strike deals 10% increased damage.
Throw Glaive deals 18,098 Physical damage to enemies near its initial target.

Consuming a Soul Fragment causes your next Chaos Strike to deal 36,197 additional Physical damage.

Felblade consumes up to 5 nearby Soul Fragments.
After consuming both enhancements, gain Thrill of the Fight, increasing your attack speed by 15% for 20 sec and your damage and healing by 15% for 10 sec.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 15,776 Physical damage.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.

Place a Sigil of Misery at the target location that activates after 1 sec.

Causes all enemies affected by the sigil to cower in fear, disorienting them for 15 sec.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.

Each enemy stunned by Chaos Nova has a 30% chance to generate a Lesser Soul Fragment.

Chaos Nova, Eye Beam, and Immolation Aura gain bonuses when striking 1 target.

 Chaos Nova:
Stun duration increased by 2 sec.

 Eye Beam:
Deals 30% increased damage.

 Immolation Aura:
Always critically strikes.
